title: Molecular Weight Calculator | Standard Atomic Weights

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: For a compound composed of elements \( E_i \) with stoichiometric coefficients \( n_i \), the molar mass \( M \) is: \( M = \sum_i n_i \, A_r(E_i) \quad [\mathrm{g \, mol^{-1}}] \) The mass percent of element \( i \) is: \( w_i(\%) = \dfrac{n_i \, A_r(E_i)}{\sum_j n_j \, A_r(E_j)} \times 100 \)

changes: Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).
